mutationType.name: RootMutationType
mutationType.description:
This is the root of all GraphQL mutations. Unlike queries, mutations
represent actions that have a side effects, like `create` or `update`.

fields.name: userManagementCreateUser
fields.description: A mutation for creating a user in an authentication domain.

args.name: createUserOptions
args.description: The input object representing the user to be created.
